sentence: Instead, Trump has endorsed former Sen. David Purdue, who lost his Senate seat in January to Democrat Jon Ossoff due at least in part to Trump's relentless quest to delegitimize election results.
author: David Faris
title: 5 midterm races to watch in 2022

sentence: Trump told Fox that he thought the Georgia primaries later this month would be interesting,? noting he had a number of endorsed candidates there, including former Sen. David Purdue (R), who he has backed against incumbent Gov.
author: Caroline Vakil
title: Trump predicts tremendous season' for Republicans he supports: I was 22 and 0'
